actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Tree Club or Trash Lob in any combination.

actions.name: Tree Club
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Trash Lob
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +8, range 60/240 ft. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.
